title: What is the significance of metaphysical reality and traditional civilization, and how can initiatory knowledge serve to navigate the crisis of modernity?
first_phrase: This text explores the concept of metaphysical reality and how one can attain a deeper understanding of it through persistence and fervor. The author, referring to Chi, explains that this reality exists independently of the human world and can provide a sense of order and meaning to life. However, the current Western world has lost touch with this reality, causing a crisis in which restoration is needed. The serious study of initiatic knowledge or tradition can not only provide spiritual guidance but also offer a glimpse of the stable and sacred order that exists beyond the chaos of today.

last_phrase: In today's world, where individuals and society have lost touch with metaphysical order, and are immersed in myths and unsustainable materialism, a crisis is inevitable. However, through a serious application of initiatic science, an orientation towards the timeless principles of tradition can provide a glimpse of a normative and sacred order that transcends the chaos of the modern world. By studying the efficiency and continuity of this wisdom in human history, one can develop a sense of its proper place as a central and dignified element of society.
